sources.title: Alaska Department of Labor and Workforce Development

nonCompete.detailedExplanation: Alaska courts strongly disfavor non-compete agreements and will only enforce them in very limited circumstances to protect trade secrets or extraordinary investments in training. Must be extremely narrow in scope and duration.
nonCompete.suggestion: Use confidentiality and trade secret protection instead of non-compete
nonCompete.actionRequired: Remove non-compete OR ensure extremely narrow scope protecting only trade secrets
nonCompete.alternativeLanguage: confidentiality obligations and protection of trade secrets in accordance with Alaska law

salaryHistory.detailedExplanation: Alaska has no law prohibiting salary history inquiries

payTransparency.detailedExplanation: No requirement to disclose salary ranges

backgroundChecks.message: Background checks permitted at any stage
backgroundChecks.detailedExplanation: No ban-the-box restrictions. Follow federal FCRA requirements.

minimumWage.detailedExplanation: Alaska minimum wage adjusts annually for inflation. 2026 rate is $11.91/hour (effective January 1, 2026). Higher than federal minimum.
minimumWage.actionRequired: Ensure all employees paid Alaska minimum wage

breaks.message: 30-minute meal break REQUIRED for 5+ hour shifts
breaks.detailedExplanation: Employers must provide at least 30-minute meal break for shifts longer than 5 hours. Break is unpaid if employee is completely relieved of duties.
breaks.requirement: Provide 30-minute meal break for 5+ hour shifts

paidLeave.detailedExplanation: No state requirement for paid sick leave or paid family leave

drugScreening.detailedExplanation: Pre-employment, random, and reasonable suspicion testing allowed

finalPay.message: Final wages due within 3 WORKING DAYS of termination
finalPay.detailedExplanation: Employers must pay all wages due within 3 working days of termination or resignation, regardless of reason. Failure to pay timely may result in penalties.
finalPay.requirement: Pay final wages within 3 working days
finalPay.actionRequired: Ensure final paycheck processed within 3 working days

payFrequency.message: Must pay employees semi-monthly or monthly
payFrequency.detailedExplanation: Wages must be paid at least semi-monthly (twice per month) on regular paydays designated in advance.
payFrequency.actionRequired: Ensure pay frequency meets state requirements
